Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelObserver
public class VirtualView extends Object implements ModelObserver
Observes the model and sends to all the clients playing the same game the required view updates through the server.

  • Method Details

    • setClientHandler

      public void setClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Adds a ClientHandler to the list of players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - that is going to be added to the list.

    • onGameCreation

      public void onGameCreation(int numPlayers, ArrayList<String> nicknames, GameMode gameMode, int whereMNID, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> entrances, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> emptyClouds, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> isleStudents, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsOnCharacter, ArrayList<Integer> numTowers, int money, int generalReserve, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, ArrayList<String> characterNames, ArrayList<Integer> characterCost, ArrayList<Integer> denyCards, ArrayList<String> characterCardsDescription, ArrayList<Squads> squads)
      Sends a GameCreation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It contains all the useful information to recreate a light version of the model saved in the ModelStorage.
      Specified by:
      onGameCreation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players that are playing the game.
      nicknames - list of all the players nickname.
      gameMode - true if the game mode is expert, else false.
      whereMNID - ID of the isle where there's mother nature.
      entrances - students on each entrance.
      emptyClouds - empty clouds at the start of the game.
      isleStudents - students on each isle.
      studentsOnCharacter - students on each character card.
      numTowers - number of towers of each player.
      money - number of money of each player.
      generalReserve - number of money in the general money reserve.
      towerColors - color of the towers of each player.
      characterNames - name of the playable character cards.
      characterCost - cost of each playable character card.
      denyCards - deny cards on the playable character cards.
      characterCardsDescription - brief description of each playable character card.
      squads - teams of each player.

    • onEndGame

      public void onEndGame(String winner, int winnerID)
      Sends a ServiceMessage to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It contains the message that has to be shown when a game ends properly
      Specified by:
      onEndGame in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      winner - is the name of the winner
      winnerID - is -1 if the game ended in a draw

    • onGamePhases

      public void onGamePhases(int activePlayer, String activePlayerNickname, GamePhases gamePhase, ActionPhases actionPhase)
      Sends a GamePhase_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It contains the information about the game phase and who is the active player but also on the winner if there's one.
      Specified by:
      onGamePhases in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      activePlayer - the player that is now the active one.
      activePlayerNickname - is the nickname of the active player
      gamePhase - game phase in which the game is now.
      actionPhase - action phase in which the game is now.

    • onAssistantCard

      public void onAssistantCard(int playerID, int turnOrderPlayed, int movementMNPlayed, ArrayList<Integer> turnOrdersAvailable, ArrayList<Integer> movementsMNAvailable)
      Sends an AssistCard_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onAssistantCard in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that played the assistant card.
      turnOrderPlayed - Turn order of the assistant card played that now is in the discard pile.
      movementMNPlayed - Mother nature possible movement of the assistant card played that now is in the discard pile.
      turnOrdersAvailable - List of all the turn orders of the assistant cards that the player hasn't played yet.
      movementsMNAvailable - List of all the possible mother nature movement of the assistant cards that the player hasn't played yet.

    • onStudentMoving_toIsle

      public void onStudentMoving_toIsle(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, int isleID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> isleStudents)
      Sends a StudentToIsle_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onStudentMoving_toIsle in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that placed a student on an isle.
      entrance - students on the entrance of the player.
      isleID - ID of the isle where the player placed the student.
      isleStudents - students of the isle where the player placed the student.

    • onStudentMoving_toDining

      public void onStudentMoving_toDining(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> dining)
      Sends a StudentToDining_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onStudentMoving_toDining in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that moved the student from his entrance to his dining room.
      entrance - students on his entrance.
      dining - students on his dining room.

      public void onProfessorUpdate(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> professors)
      Sends a Professor_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onProfessorUpdate in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      professors - professors of all the players.

    • onMoneyUpdate

      public void onMoneyUpdate(int playerID, int money, int generalMoneyReserve)
      Sends a Money_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onMoneyUpdate in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that got his money changed (by gaining from the dining room or by losing them from playing a character card).
      money - number of money of the player now.
      generalMoneyReserve - general money reserve updated number of money.

    • onDenyCard

      public void onDenyCard(int grandmaIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int isleID, int denyCard)
      Sends a DenyCard_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onDenyCard in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      grandmaIndex - the index of GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      cardCost - the cost of GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on GRANDMA_HERBS character card.
      isleID - ID of the isle where the deny card has been removed.
      denyCard - number of deny cards on the isle.

    • onMNMovement

      public void onMNMovement(int totalIsles, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> students, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, int whereMNId, ArrayList<Boolean> denyCards, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfIsles, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfTowers)
      Sends a MNMovement_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onMNMovement in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      totalIsles - the actual number of isle.
      students - students on each isle.
      towerColors - tower colors on each isle.
      whereMNId - ID of the isle where now there's mother nature.
      denyCards - deny cards number on each isle.
      numberOfIsles - the number of isle tha compose an isle (isle with 2 or more isles are unified isles)
      numberOfTowers - the number of towers on each isle.

    • onCloudUpdate

      public void onCloudUpdate(int playerID, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> entrance, int cloudId)
      Sends a PickFromCloud_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onCloudUpdate in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that picked the students from a cloud.
      entrance - students that are now on the entrance of the player.
      cloudId - ID of the picked cloud.

    • onFillCloud

      public void onFillCloud(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> clouds)
      Sends a FillCloud_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onFillCloud in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      clouds - students on each cloud when are refilled.

    • onKO

      public void onKO(int playerID, String errorMessage)
      Sends a KO to the player that occurred in an error.
      Specified by:
      onKO in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that receive the KO message.
      errorMessage - brief description of what the error is.

    • onCharacterCard

      public void onCharacterCard(int characterCardIndex, CharacterCardsName cardName, int cardCost, int playerID, int generalReserve, int playerMoney, int denyCards, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCharacter)
      Sends a CharacterCard_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      onCharacterCard in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      cardName - name of the character card played.
      cardCost - cost of the character card played (after having been played).
      playerID - ID of the player that played the character card.
      generalReserve - the number of money in the general money reserve after having played the character card.
      playerMoney - the number of money of the player after having played the character card.
      denyCards - number of deny cards on the character card after having been played.
      studentsOnCharacter - students on the character card after having been played.

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int color, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> students)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the MONK / JESTER.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      cardCost - cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - deny cards on the character card played.
      studentsOnCard - students on the character card played.
      color - color of the first student chosen.
      students - students on the chosen isle (MONK) / player entrance (JESTER).

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> professors)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the FARMER.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      professors - on each player dining room.

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(int totalIsles, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> students, ArrayList<TowerColors> towerColors, int whereMNID, ArrayList<Boolean> denyCards, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfIsles, ArrayList<Integer> numberOfTowers)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the HERALD.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      totalIsles - the actual number of isles.
      students - students on each isle.
      towerColors - colors of the towers on each isle.
      whereMNID - isle where there's mother nature.
      denyCards - number of deny cards on each isle.
      numberOfIsles - indicates for each group of isles how many isles are in it (unified isles there are 2 or more isles).
      numberOfTowers - number of towers in the player tower storage.

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(int playerID, int turnOrder, int mnMovement)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the MAGICAL_LETTER_CARRIER.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that played the character card.
      turnOrder - turn order of the assistant card in the discard pile.
      mnMovement - possible mother nature movement of the assistant card in the discard pile.

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, int isleID, int denyCard)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the GRANDMA_HERBS.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - the index of the character card played.
      cardCost - the cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on the character card played.
      isleID - ID of the isle chosen by the player in which it will be put a deny card.
      denyCard - number of deny cards on the isle chosen.

      public void onEffectActivation()

      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver

      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the MINSTREL, THIEF.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      studentsInEntrance - students on the entrance of each player.
      studentsInDining - students on the dining room of each player.

    • onEffectActivation

      public void onEffectActivation(int characterCardIndex, int cardCost, int denyCardsOnCard, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> studentsOnCard, ArrayList<HashMap<RealmColors,Integer>> studentsInDining)
      Sends an EffectActivation_UpdateMsg to all the players that are playing the same game observed by the VirtualView. It's used to activate the effect of the SPOILED_PRINCESS.
      Specified by:
      onEffectActivation in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card played.
      cardCost - the cost of the character card played.
      denyCardsOnCard - number of deny cards on the character card.
      studentsOnCard - students on the character card.
      studentsInDining - students on the dining room of each player.
